org.omancode.util.swing
Class PrefsOrOpenFileChooser

java.lang.Object
  org.omancode.util.swing.PrefsOrOpenFileChooser

public class PrefsOrOpenFileChooser
extends Object

A Swing file chooser that checks the preferences before prompting the user to select a file. Also retains the last directory selected across invocations in the preferences.

Version:
$Revision: 3 $
Author:
Oliver Mannion

public static final String DEFAULT_PROMPT

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

PrefsOrOpenFileChooser

public PrefsOrOpenFileChooser(Preferences prefs)
Construct an instance using prefs from caller. Sets the JFileChooser current directory to the last directory saved in the caller's prefs.

Parameters:
prefs - the caller's Preferences

PrefsOrOpenFileChooser

public PrefsOrOpenFileChooser(Class<?> prefsClass)
Construct an instance using the preferences for the supplied class.

Parameters:
prefsClass - class to look up prefs for. If null uses prefs for FileUtil.class.
Method Detail

getFile

public File getFile(String prefsKey)
             throws IOException
Convenience method which displays the chooser with the dialog title DEFAULT_PROMPT + prefsKey. The chooser has no file filters. The file selected is saved to prefsKey.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename.
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

getFile

public File getFile(String prefsKey,
                    String prompt,
                    FileFilter filter,
                    boolean saveFileSelectedToPrefs)
             throws IOException
Lookup the file from the prefs, or if it doesn't exist prompt the user via a open file dialog.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename. If null then prefs is not looked up and the user is prompted for the file.
prompt - prompt message to ask user to select a file.
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog. If null, then no filter applied and any type of file can be selected.
saveFileSelectedToPrefs - if true save the file selected to the prefs
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

getDirectory

public File getDirectory(String prefsKey,
                         String prompt,
                         boolean saveDirSelectedToPrefs)
                  throws IOException
Lookup the directory from the prefs, or if it doesn't exist prompt the user via a open file dialog.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored directory. If null then prefs is not looked up and the user is prompted for the directory.
prompt - prompt message to ask user to select a directory.
saveDirSelectedToPrefs - if true save the file selected to the prefs
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid directory is selected when prompted.

showOpenDialog

public File showOpenDialog(String dialogTitle,
                           Component parent,
                           FileFilter filter)
Show a JFileChooser open file dialog. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog. If null, then no filter applied and any type of file can be selected.
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.

showOpenDialogForDirectories

public File showOpenDialogForDirectories(String dialogTitle,
                                         Component parent)
Show a JFileChooser open file dialog containing directories only. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.
